0.name: Noah Lebovic
0.review: Fabien was fantastic guiding the bike tour of Paris. Very informative and entertaining and helpful. Great way to get a feel for the city and discover some of its hidden corners - really enjoyed the experience. Martin from Edinburgh.

1.name: John Smith
1.review: Amazing, wonderfull, génial, au top !!! Orignal, intéressant... Ne pas hésiter, foncez !
